channel.title: framework on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in framework on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Ruby on Rails Logo
Ruby on Rails, or Rails, is a server-side web application framework written in Ruby under the MIT License. Rails is a model–view–controller framework, providing default structures for a database, a web service, and web pages. It encourages and facilitates the use of web standards such as JSON or XML for data transfer and HTML, CSS and JavaScript for user interfacing. In addition to MVC, Rails emphasizes the use of other well-known software engineering patterns and paradigms, including convention over configuration, don’t repeat yourself, and the active record pattern.
You can download theRailslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Rails
item.description: Ruby on Rails, or Rails, is a server-side web application framework written in Ruby under the MIT License. Rails is a model–view–controller framework, providing default structures for a database, a web service, and web pages. It encourages and facilitates the use of web standards such as JSON or XML for data transfer and HTML, CSS and JavaScript for user interfacing. In addition to MVC, Rails emphasizes the use of other well-known software engineering patterns and paradigms, including convention over configuration, don’t repeat yourself, and the active record pattern.
